phrs.translation: 保湿面霜, 滋润肌肤

sentences.sentence: Most soaps have emollients(moisturisers) added, so they are beneficial for the skin.
sentences.translation: 大多数香皂都添加了润肤剂（润肤霜），所以对肌肤有益。

sentences.sentence: Most soaps have emollients(moisturisers)added, so they are beneficial for the skin.
sentences.translation: 大多数香皂都添加了润肤剂（润肤霜），所以对肌肤有益。

sentences.sentence: Some particular face moisturisers or make-up can make acne worse. Oil-based foundation can make acne worse.
sentences.translation: 一些特殊的脸部保湿液或者化妆品会导致青春痘的恶化。
